hero.name: Nayan Ray
hero.description: I craft premium, high-performance web experiences with modern front-end tooling, robust WordPress architecture and pixel-perfect UI. Focused on performance, accessibility and delightful micro-interactions.

about.title: About Me
about.craftingExcellence: Crafting digital excellence through innovative solutions, cutting-edge technology, and a passion for creating exceptional user experiences
about.introduction1: I'm Nayan Ray, a passionate Full-Stack Developer with expertise in modern web technologies. With over 4 years of professional experience, I specialize in creating scalable, high-performance applications that deliver exceptional user experiences.
about.introduction2: My approach combines technical excellence with strategic thinking, ensuring every project not only meets technical requirements but also drives business growth and user engagement through innovative solutions.

freelance.title: Full Stack Developer
freelance.description: Developing modern web applications with React, Node.js, and cloud technologies

wordpress.title: WordPress Developer
wordpress.description: Specialized in custom WordPress themes and e-commerce solutions

frontend.title: Frontend Developer
frontend.description: Built responsive web applications and improved user experiences
